name: f1rel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wrel(c0), wfn(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wrel(c0))
-| wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wrel(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wrel(c0))
-| wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wrel(c0))

|- wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wrel(c0))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wrel(c0))

comment: A one-to-one onto mapping is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2014.)
